title: 8/31/17 - Life is easy, but people are complex
description:
Get gas now...gas shortages in Texas!...Nancy Pelosi doesn't quite know about the 'great' depression...Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton discusses 'price gouging' and what flood victims in Houston are facing amid the challenges to just survive ...Update on Bubby Cruzan's fight in the hospital...Author Brad Thor discusses the global impact from Hurricane Harvey and what's next for Russia...A stranded grandfather, Chick-Fil-A and a jet ski.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
